badges.label: Data Sources Disclosed
badges.description: Uses OWID ‘National contributions to climate change’ dataset (Jones et al., 2023) with linked raw files & code.

badges.label: Complicated Units
badges.description: Shows °C warming from three greenhouse gases—CO₂, CH₄, N₂O—stacked by fossil vs land-agriculture sources.

badges.label: Known Data-Gap
badges.description: Aerosol cooling is excluded, so totals slightly over-state net warming.

badges.label: Open Data
badges.description: Full dataset and scripts are freely downloadable from OWID’s GitHub.

badges.label: Aggregated Data
badges.description: Stacks six gas-source layers; values are cumulative since 1851, so annual or sector-level detail is hidden..

badges.label: Uncertainty Not Visualized
badges.description: Lines are best estimates; statistical and model uncertainties aren’t shown.

badges.label: CC BY License
badges.description: Chart and data are CC BY 4.0—reuse is fine with attribution to OWID.
